message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. This is a great price considering the value it brings to your business.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm still looking for a price that reflects the product's true value. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $10500. This is a fair compromise considering the benefits it will bring to your business.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still not comfortable with $10500. I'm willing to pay up to $9500 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering my budget and the value the product will bring to my business.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but I'm still not willing to sell the product for $9500. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $11000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value and my costs.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with $11000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $10250. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and my budget. I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.

I understand your willingness to meet me halfway, Bob, but I'm still not willing to sell the product for $10250. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $11500. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value and my costs. I'm getting close to selling it to John for $15000, so I need to make a decision soon.
